description: Pat's guitar was added taking this live as a reference https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4zoV_2ctjR4, some errors were fixed in the bass, drums and voice
title: All My Life

description: Removed an extra measure I accidentally added at the end of the first verse and added a few palm mutes that I forgot in the riff in the second and third verses.
title: All My Life

description: Mashed a few different revisions together, as well as adding a few of my own changes to make the tab more accurate. Added vocals (that are incomplete. The middle two verses are missing because the rhythms on the older revisions were god-awful) and lyrics. Changed a few of the riffs so they only have the root and the third, changed the main riff played by the lead guitar so it's correct, and changed the chords during the chorus to be correct (the original ones were still the right chords, but some of them weren't how the band plays the chords and/or hard to play), as well as adding chord names. Not sure if the ending with the lead guitar is correct, but it's what I found on previous revisions and it seemed much closer than the revision before this one.
title: All My Life

description: does not sound as choppy. The Pre-Chorus and chorus has better voicing
title: All My Life
